urls.title: Allies despair as Trump abandons America's leadership role at a time of global crisis
urls.description: The United States has scaled back its role on the world stage, taken actions that are undermining efforts to battle the coronavirus pandemic and left the international community without a traditional global leader, according to experts, diplomats and analysts.
